a.detail: The walls here have been engraved with glowing symbols
a.summary: The walls here have been engraved with glowing symbols

c.detail: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths
c.summary: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths

i.detail: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here

n.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +6 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

r.detail:
Arrow Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +3 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

s.detail: The walls here have been engraved with geometric patterns

Poison Gas Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 18 save or take 4d10 poison damage

v.detail: The floor is covered with ash
v.summary: The floor is covered with ash

details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful evil fighter as a mine. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been conquered and altered many times since then.

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
1400 cp, 900 sp, 20 gp, azurite (10 gp), lapis lazuli (10 gp), moss agate (10 gp), obsidian (10 gp), rhodochrosite (10 gp), 2 x tiger eye (10 gp)
monster: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp

Treasure: 2700 cp, 700 sp, 70 gp, a brass bracer inlaid with a filigree of copper (25 gp), a cloth cloak threaded with dyed silk (25 gp), a cloth mantle trimmed with fox fur (25 gp), a pewter plate etched with dwarven axeheads (25 gp), Potion of Resistance (force) (uncommon, dmg 188), Bag of Holding (uncommon, dmg 153), Oil of Slipperiness (uncommon, dmg 184), Potion of Animal Friendship (uncommon, dmg 187)
trap:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

contents.summary: Silver Dragon Wyrmling, Magic Missle Trap, Hidden Treasure

monster: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp
Treasure: 1500 cp, 800 sp, 30 gp, diamond (50 gp), carnelian (50 gp), citrine (50 gp), jasper (50 gp), moonstone (50 gp), onyx (50 gp), Boots of Speed (rare, dmg 155)
detail.room_features: The floor is covered in perfect hexagonal tiles, and the scent of smoke fills the east side of the room
A tapestry of a legendary battle hangs from the east wall, and someone has scrawled "I've forgotten my name" on the west wall

north.desc: Unlocked Good Wooden Door (15 hp) (slides down)

south.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

detail.room_features: Spirals of green stones cover the floor, and unintelligible whispering can be faintly heard near the south wall
A narrow pit covered by iron bars lies in the north side of the room, and a fountain of water sits against the north wall

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.2: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.3: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.4: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.5: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
